scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two haloed women within a decorative initial 'O'. The woman on the left, wearing a white wimple and an orange cloak over a blue garment, embraces the woman on the right. The woman on the right, dressed in a blue robe, raises her right hand in a gesture of greeting or surprise. The background is a stylized landscape of green hills under a blue sky. The scene is framed by ornamental borders characteristic of medieval manuscripts.
